TDGameMain2 - Class in code.game
This is the view class for Tower Defence Game play, containing all the UI components implementing observer

Constructor of TDGameMain, initializes the game methods to be drawn
TDGameMain2Test - Class in code.game.tests
Test case class to check if the observer pattern is implemented correctly.
TDGameMain2Test() - Constructor for class code.game.tests.TDGameMain2Test
 
testAddTower() - Method in class code.game.tests.GameMapTest
Test to check if a tower can be successfully added to the scenery.
testcheckCritrExist() - Method in class code.game.tests.GameMapTest
Test to check if critter exist at a particular location in map.

Test to check if the factory design is implemented properly and polymorphism is achieved.

Test to check if SingleGameController is implementing Singleton design pattern.
testDeleteTower() - Method in class code.game.tests.GameMapTest
Test to check if a tower can be successfully deleted from the map.
testLoadMap() - Method in class code.game.tests.GameMapTest
Test to check if the map model object is created correctly from the map in file.
testObserverPtrn() - Method in class code.game.tests.TDGameMain2Test
Test to check if when the game data model account balance is updated, the corresponding update is made on the account balance in view.
testReadMap() - Method in class code.game.tests.SingleGameControllerTest
Test to read a map from file and check if it is read properly.
testSellTower() - Method in class code.game.tests.SingleGameControllerTest
Test to sell a tower and get the account balance updated with refund value.
testStrategy() - Method in class code.game.tests.NearestStrategyTest
Test to check if the nearest critter to tower is selected by the tower strategy.
testStrategy() - Method in class code.game.tests.StrongestStrategyTest
Test to check if the strongest critter is selected by the tower strategy.
testStrategy() - Method in class code.game.tests.WeakestStrategyTest
Test to check if the weakest critter is selected by the tower strategy.
testUpgradeLowBalnc() - Method in class code.game.tests.SingleGameControllerTest
Test to fail to upgrade a tower with low account balance.
testUpgradeWithBalnc() - Method in class code.game.tests.SingleGameControllerTest
Test to upgrade a tower successfully with enough account balance.
TowerModel - Class in code.game.models
This class defines the necessary properties of the tower and exposes methods to access and modify the tower objects.
TowerModel(String, int, int, int, int, float, int) - Constructor for class code.game.models.TowerModel
Constructor for defining an object of the tower model.
TowerStrategy - Interface in code.game.strategies
an interface to implement tower's strategy pattern
